attributes.additional_details:
Make all student loans interest free 

This will make more people consider university degrees
attributes.background:
The government wants people to better themselves by going to higher education yet higher education is unaffordable and the interests rates alone are off putting and frankly 
Disappointing 

If you want young people to go to university 
It should be affordable

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Abolish interest charges on student loans
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756832
